features.title: GroupDocs.Merger features
features.description: Easily merge, split, and manipulate PDF and Office documents with powerful tools.

feature_1.title: Combine files
feature_1.content: Merge multiple documents into one, selecting specific pages or page ranges from different source files.

feature_2.title: Split document
feature_2.content: Break a document into multiple smaller files, making it easier to manage and organize content.

feature_3.title: Move pages
feature_3.content: Reorder your document by moving pages to a new position with the MovePage feature.

feature_4.title: Remove pages
feature_4.content: Delete individual pages or a set of specific pages from a document using the RemovePages feature.

feature_5.title: Rotate pages
feature_5.content: Rotate pages in a document by 90, 180, or 270 degrees with the RotatePages feature.

feature_6.title: Swap pages
feature_6.content: Change the order of pages by swapping two pages within the document.

feature_7.title: Extract pages
feature_7.content: Create a new document containing only selected pages by extracting specific pages or page ranges.

feature_8.title: Change orientation
feature_8.content: Switch page orientation between portrait and landscape for specific or all pages in a document.

feature_9.title: Preview pages
feature_9.content: Generate image previews of document pages to get a better view of their content and layout.
